room_title: Escape room " Mummy’s Revenge" by Escape Room Zone in Detroit
room_address: 31401 John R Rd Madison Heights, MI 48071
room_description: A new pyramid has been discovered in the middle of the Sahara desert and is remarkably untouched. You and your team of archaeologists decide to explore it before anyone else gets the chance to and plan an exhibition right away. Upon entering the tomb, you realize this would be no normal exhibition and this was no normal tomb. Word to the wise: DON’T WAKE THE MUMMY!
